inclusion.criterion: scheduled for endoscopic transsphenoidal approach to remove tumor under general anesthesia with endotracheal tube
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: the patient does not sign a consent form to participate to the study
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He came to the clinic for follow-up lab studies after his primary resection surgery.
